original_text: On the next day the crowd that remained on the other side of the sea saw that there had been only one boat there, and that Jesus had not entered the boat with his disciples, but that his disciples had gone away alone.
korean_text: 이튿날 바다 건너편에 서 있던 무리가 배 한 척 외에 다른 배가 거기 없는 것과 또 어제 예수께서 제자들과 함께 그 배에 오르지 아니하시고 제자들만 가는 것을 보았더니

sentences.original_text: the crowd that remained on the other side of the sea
saw that there had been only one boat there
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 배가 한 척뿐이었던 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: and that Jesus had not entered the boat with his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 제자들과 함께 그 배에 타지 않았으나

sentences.original_text: but that his disciples had gone away alone
